column1: Please do not change the template headings.
First data column must be blank.
If you are uploading new records, leave the "name" (ID) column blank.
If you are uploading new records, "Naming Series" becomes mandatory, if present.
Only mandatory fields are necessary for new records. You can delete non-mandatory columns if you wish.
For updating, you can update only selective columns.
You can only upload upto 5000 records in one go. (may be less in some cases)

<html>
<head>

<script>
function replaceAll(s,s1,s2){ return s.split(s1).join(s2);}

function get_letter_head() {
	// add letter head
	var cp = locals['Control Panel']['Control Panel'];
	if(doc.letter_head)
		var lh= cstr(_p.letter_heads[doc.letter_head]);
	else if(cp.letter_head)
		var lh= cp.letter_head;
	else 
		var lh= '';
		
	return lh;
}

</script>
<style>
.cust_tbl { border-collapse:collapse; }
.cust_tbl td { border:1px solid #848484; font-size: 13px}
.large_font td {font-size: 13px}
</style>
</head>

<body>
<script>
replaceAll(doc.print_packing_slip,'[HEADER GOES HERE]',get_letter_head());
</script>
</body>
</html>
